RumorFact.Text: An invitation to the Sun Station instructing its crew on how to reach the Deep Storm Station was written to the Sun Station.
The Sun Station crew's projection stone inviting them to the Deep Storm Station was left somewhere on the Sun Station's catwalk.

ExploreFact.Text: To enter the Deep Storm Station, Nomai would need to travel to a new warp pad installed on the Construction Yard.
Nomai on the Probe Tracking Module would be first to receive and then share the results of the test with the Deep Storm Station, through the module's projection whiteboard.
